title: Explanation- (i) "Prescribed width" here means the width prescribed in the DP or the width resulting from the prescription of a sanctioned regular line of the street under the MMC Act, whichever is larger
clause_text: Explanation- (i) "Prescribed width" here means the width prescribed in the DP or the width resulting from the prescription of a sanctioned regular line of the street under the MMC Act, whichever is larger.
